revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Hak5 |model = WiFi Pineapple |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Mark V |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = GN204 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = WiFi security auditing tool |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AA52MK5 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-Y5C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:13:37 |oui = 00:13:37
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, microSD |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5-12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, external,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;187, 6691, A305;1;,,, 2-Port USB Hub Controller and Card Reader;Alcor Micro;AU6350;ALCOR, AU6350, A41-MGL-GR, H7S582-IF, 1325TDJ;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 172.16.42.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = change_on_install |defaultssid = Pineapple |defaultssid_regex = ^Pineapple$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/21/2013 |estreldate = 10/12/2013 |estprice = 99 |upc = 748252507303 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8187L; |rad2chip2 = Realtek;RTL8225; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = SMA |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MK5", "V1.3", and a date code of "3213" (Aug. 2013) is silkscreened on the FCC EUT's board.. :as well as on the boards shown on ''Pentura Labs'' blog + ''Hak5 Mark V Exposed'' :video (see below for both). Default settings are as per [https://www.wifipineapple.com/mk5/booklet.pdf QSG].
===Specifications=== *[http://penturalabs.wordpress.com/2013/10/27/naked-wifi-pineapple-mark-v/ ''Naked WiFi Pineapple Mark V!'' on '''Pentura Labs''' blog] :(excellent internal images and general info dump) :Most useful specifications are per this blog post. :*[[Winbond]] W25Q128FVSG (8MB) SPI Flash + [[SK hynix]] H5PS5162GFR-Y5C (64MB) RAM :*[[Realtek]] RTL8225 RF IC + [[Richwave]] RTC6691 PA IC for the RTL8187L :*[[Alcor Micro]] AU6350 - USB 2.0 Hub + Card Reader on the board :*00:13:37 OUI on board MAC label, presumed to be used for all interfaces
==Links of Interest== ===Forums threads=== *[https://forums.hak5.org/index.php?/forum/78-mark-v/ ''Mark V forum'' on the '''Hak5 forums''']
===Links=== *[http://hakshop.myshopify.com/collections/wifi-pineapple/products/wifi-pineapple ''WiFi Pineapple Mark V Standard'' on the '''HakShop'''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swlPEeQDds4 ''(NSFW) 5 Days of Mark V (part 5) - WiFi Pineapple Exposed'' on '''YouTube'''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkrI_TNTWU0 ''Ultimate Peter'''s unboxing video on '''YouTube''']
==See also== ===Included power supply, per FCC data=== {{hasPowerSupply |brand = unknown |model = BX-0901500 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=9 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }}
